mapper.insert: insert into TF_OP_TRAIN (TRAIN_SERIAL, TRAIN_ID, STATION_ID, PASS_TIME, DIRECTION, VEHICLE_NUMBER, FREIGHT_VEHICLE_NUMBER, CAR_VEHICLE_NUMBER, SPEED, TRAIN_SORT, ENGINE_NUMBER, PASS_KIND, PASS_STATE, VIEW_STATE, PIC_VALID_STATE, HIGHEST_SPEED, LOWEST_SPEED, EQU_DETECT_NUMBER, INDEX_ID, DETECT_NUMBER, DAY_NIGHT, TEAM, REMARK, IMG_READY_STATUS, LOCK_VERSION, TRAIN_STATUS, VEHICLE_EXPOSURE, PHOTO_EXPOSURE, VEHICLE_BLACK, PHOTO_BLACK, VEHICLE_LOST, PHOTO_LOST, VEHICLE_DISOERDER, FILE_CREATED_RESULT, FILE_CREATED_REMARK ) values (#{trainSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{freightVehicleNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{carVehicleNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{speed,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{trainSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engineNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{passKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picValidState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highestSpeed,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lowestSpeed,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{equDetectNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{indexId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{detectNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dayNight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{team,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgReadyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lockVersion,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{trainStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleExposure,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{photoExposure,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{vehicleBlack,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{photoBlack,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{vehicleLost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{photoLost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{vehicleDisoerder,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileCreatedResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileCreatedRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
